name: Overtime (beat1823)
description:
This is our submission for Scream Zone Jam 9. 

It's Nora's first week and after a long meeting on Friday, things start to get strange.

It's a work in progress, currently playable to the halfway point.

Programming: Cameron

Art: Adam

Story: Morgan

Voice: Morgan, Kaitlyn, Midori

Audio: Carlos

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse- Look

E - Interact/Open

F - Flashlight

Alt-F4 - Close Game
